author: bsunanda
body:
The AlCaReco producers and the Tree makers for IsoTrack and Muon are made to follow MT standards. Introduced a different track selection criteria from Marina's studies. Restore Olga's original version of tree makers for NZS work.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_5_X #9515 (original by @bsunanda).
title: bsunanda:Run2 alca16
